metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7861 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 23.0.0.205 and earlier, 11.2.202.643 and earlier have an exploitable type confusion vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.644ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.644ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.644ubuntu0.16.04.1').
